name: Finding Battery
description:
You are a toy rocket and your battery is low! You have to find the battery, so you have to defeat the Robot and get the battery!

Controls: Steer with A and D key, thrust with Space key and pause game with ESC.

My Youtube Channel: www.youtube.com/channel/UCHl_qSx9PTYc-0B5kS2jihA?sub_confirmation=1
